description: Describes Amazon RDS instances. Required Permissions: To use this action, an IAM user must have a Show, Deploy, or Manage permissions level for the stack, or an attached policy that explicitly grants permissions. For more information about user permissions, see Managing User Permissions. This call accepts only one resource-identifying parameter.

parameters.name: StackId
parameters.description: The ID of the stack with which the instances are registered. The operation returns descriptions of all registered Amazon RDS instances.

parameters.name: RdsDbInstanceArns
parameters.description: An array containing the ARNs of the instances to be described. (string) ---

nested_items.name: RdsDbInstances
nested_items.description: An a array of RdsDbInstance objects that describe the instances.

nested_items.name: DbPassword
nested_items.description: OpsWorks Stacks returns *****FILTERED***** instead of the actual value.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The instance's Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: StackId
nested_items.description: The ID of the stack with which the instance is registered.

nested_items.name: MissingOnRds
nested_items.description: Set to true if OpsWorks Stacks is unable to discover the Amazon RDS instance. OpsWorks Stacks attempts to discover the instance only once. If this value is set to true, you must deregister the instance, and then register it again.
